name: Harshit Tiwari
intro: I am a B.Tech student in Internet of Things at Madhav Institute of Technology and Science (MITS), Gwalior (2022–2026). I am passionate about IoT, AI/ML, and full-stack development, with hands-on experience in building real-world applications and leading student communities like IEEE PES.

projects.title: AI-IoT Solar Dust Cleaning System
projects.description: AI/ML-based IoT system that uses CNN (VGG16 architecture) to classify dusty vs clean solar panels and controls a cleaning pump via ESP32, improving solar efficiency by 94%.

projects.title: Air Quality Prediction
projects.description: Machine learning model using AQI dataset (SO2, NO2, PM2.5, etc.) with preprocessing and AQI sub-index calculation, deployed with Flask UI for real-time prediction.

projects.title: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Built a scalable chat app using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, and Socket.io with microservice architecture. Integrated Docker for deployment and achieved sub-100ms latency.

projects.title: RF Framework for Parkinson’s Diagnosis
projects.description: Developed a Random Forest–based ML framework to predict Parkinson’s Disease using biomedical voice features (jitter, shimmer, Fo, NHR, HNR). Integrated with Flask for real-time predictions.

projects.title: Diabetes Prediction Web App
projects.description: Created an SVM-based ML application that predicts diabetes with 92% accuracy. Built a Flask web app for real-time user input and diagnosis.
